locations.name: Amsterdam
locations.description: The vibrant starting point of the cruise in the Netherlands, where travelers embark after exploring its canals and museums.

locations.name: Cologne
locations.description: A major stop along the Rhine in Germany, known for its magnificent Gothic Cathedral, where the ship docks for exploration.

locations.name: Strasbourg
locations.description: The cruise docks near this captivating Alsatian capital in France, allowing exploration of the fairytale Petite France district.

locations.name: Basel
locations.description: The final destination of the cruise in Switzerland, where travelers disembark after the journey concludes.
